title: dual monitors
body: I have  dual monitors but once I choose a character and the game loads...the other screen shuts down...how do I make this stop.

replies.body:
It sounds like you may be running into an "Out of Range" situation. If this is the case, try hitting **ALT+ENTER** once you see the game start loading up after champ select. This should toggle you out of a window mode that may be encountering issues.

Let me know if this worked!
thx...I will try this in a bit...having to be a grown up sucks but oh well lol
Switch from Full Screen to Borderless Windowed.
